rows.label: qev060204_MSG0001
rows.name:
Eeeeee hee hee! I have become a metaphorical GOD!
The time is nigh to cleanse these filthy clockwork lives
with holy voltant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0002
rows.name:
Aaaand...now! ...Okay, now! C'mon, you can do this.
Just dump this stuff in the reservoir already.
You can DO this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0010
rows.name: Stop[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0011
rows.name: Step in and prevent the voltant spillage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0020
rows.name: Watch[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0021
rows.name: Hold back and see what happens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Whatever. I can do it whenever I want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'll end them all after lunch. I'm a god after all!
Eee hee hee! Gods work on their own schedules!
No need to rush. No no no.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0005
rows.name: Eeagh! Wh-what are you doing here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, I see... You figured it out from the message I sent.
It seems some BLADEs aren't total idiots after all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0007
rows.name:
So be it! This is my grand show, and what's a show
without a metaphorical audience?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0008
rows.name:
Now watch in horror as I throw the voltant in!
Then all the fakes in the city can drink it and go to
hell in a writhing dance of purest agony![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0030
rows.name: Demand[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0031
rows.name: Insist that Homer stop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0040
rows.name: Soothe[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0041
rows.name: Try to calm Homer down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0009
rows.name:
You idiot. It's too late for that now!
I've come this far, and there's no going back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0010
rows.name:
If jumping off a metaphorical cliff was the only way to
save your life, you'd do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0011
rows.name:
No. I've come too far.
All that's left is to throw this holy voltant in![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0012
rows.name: I'm gonna do it! I have to! I'm totally doing it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'm...I'm doing it. I'm doing it! I'm throwing it in!
I'M THROWING IT IIIIIIIIIN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0014
rows.name:
Hmph. You're a lot more reasonable that I thought
you'd be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0015
rows.name:
Perhaps I'll explain my grand philosophy to you before
I end New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0016
rows.name: It's this body! I refuse to accept this mimeosome![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0017
rows.name:
The moment we forsake our god-given bodies,
we stop being human and become nothing more than
a metaphorical husk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0018
rows.name:
You see that, don't you? Living like this is...
It's heresy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that you concur with Homer's opinion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0060
rows.name: Disagree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0061
rows.name: Reject Homer's opinion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0019
rows.name: You do...? O-of course you do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0020
rows.name:
I knew I was right. Thank you. This gives me the
conviction I need to pass judgment on them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0021
rows.name: I'm going to do it. I have to... I'm totally doing it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'm...I'm doing it! I'm throwing it in!
I'M THROWING IT IIIIIIIIIN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0023
rows.name: Grk... But how can you be sure of yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0024
rows.name:
How can you think of yourself as human when your
body is made of the same stuff as a soulless robot?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0025
rows.name:
Every day, I'd panicâ€”but everyone else just went about
their business like nothing was different. It... It...
It made me so MAD![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0026
rows.name:
What IS a soul, anyway? If it ever existed, it certainly
doesn't in robots. And without our flesh and blood,
we have no way of proving we're really human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0027
rows.name:
Those fakes can deceive themselves all they like,
but they'll never be real humans. And neither will we.
So we should all just give up and end it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0028
rows.name:
Let's all use this voltant to end the pain. Or...no.
I'll do it for them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0071
rows.name: Concur with Homer's conclusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0080
rows.name: Disagree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0081
rows.name: Reject Homer's conclusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0029
rows.name: ...Wait. Why aren't you stopping me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0030
rows.name:
Are you going to tell me that you know how I feel?
That you also lie awake nights with this uncertainty?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0031
rows.name:
No... Not just you. What if everyone's dealing with
this? What if they're all busy going about their day
as a blessed distraction from doubt and fear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0032
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0033
rows.name:
I knew you'd try to stop me! You're one of THEM.
One of the unfeeling ones![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0034
rows.name: I'm gonna do it! I have to! I'm totally doing it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'm...I'm doing it! I'm throwing it in!
I'M THROWING IT IIIIIIIIIN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0090
rows.name: Persuade[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0091
rows.name: Make a last-ditch effort to sway Homer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0100
rows.name: Wait[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0101
rows.name: Stand in silence and force Homer to think for himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0036
rows.name:
RRRRRRGH! I...I don't even know what I think anymore!
It's all a mess in my head...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0037
rows.name: But I know how to end that. I'll end it all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0038
rows.name: I'm gonna do it. I have to. I'm totally doing it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0039
rows.name:
I'm...I'm doing it! I'm throwing it in!
I'M THROWING IT IIIIIIIIIN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0040
rows.name:
This whole time, I... I've just been a metaphorical dog,
snarling and growling to cover up his own cowardice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0041
rows.name:
I convinced myself I was a god because I wanted to be
rid of this fear. Because I was jealous of how strong
everyone else was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0042
rows.name:
So I stole this stuff and sent out that message,
hoping on some subconscious level to be stopped.
Then I stood here for hours, too scared to do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0043
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0044
rows.name:
I'm just glad I realized it before dumping this stuff in
the water supply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0045
rows.name:
You're like a metaphorical beam of light dispelling the
darkness I'd lost myself in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0046
rows.name:
...Here. I'll let you take care of this.
I'm going to turn myself in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0047
rows.name: Eeeeee hee hee hee hee hee! Die, die, DIEEEEEE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0048
rows.name:
One after the next, I'll watch you all drop like
metaphorical flies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0049
rows.name: Hmm? Why is there voltant in the air? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0050
rows.name:
Mmm... I'm feeling a bit out of sorts. *fsssh*
I think a quick bit of devoltanizing before my nap is
just what the metaphorical doctor ordered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0051
rows.name:
Ahhhh... Now THAT is satisfying! *fsssh*
It's as if my stomach is metaphorically full.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0052
rows.name:
...Hmm? Wait, what are you doing way out here,
[ST:playername ]? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0110
rows.name: Explain[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0111
rows.name:
Tell Phoskeran about how you
were talking Homer down.

rows.label: qev060204_JNK0120
rows.name: Query[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Phoskeran what HE is doing here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0053
rows.name: *fsssh* I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0054
rows.name:
Well, carry on. *fsssh* Oh, and that's the man who
taught me about metaphors, so treat him well, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0055
rows.name:
Horonalderon's complaining was far too loud,
so I had to come out here for a nap. *fsssh*
Oh, but please keep this between us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0056
rows.name: Well, lovely to see you. *fsssh* Take care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0057
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0058
rows.name:
So the same Zaruboggan idiot that handed over all
that voltant without question just ruined everything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060204_MSG0059
rows.name:
I... Wow. I don't even care anymore. About anything.
I guess I'll head back to the city and...turn myself in or
whatever.[ST:wait ]
